item.description:
This flight was so awesome a few weeks ago, members brought it up again. So let's go! It's a short flight but a really missed gem of a place.

Marshfield, MA (KGHG).

We can fly into Marshfield and have dinner at
Fieldston Restaurant (www.thefieldston.com) located right on the ocean. We could take their courtesy van again....I'm sure everyone is up for a nice beautiful scenic flight. We meet at Charley's hangar. Wheels up 5:30, eat and enjoy a sunset flight back.

http://www.airnav.com...
55.4 nautical miles

This is Gary Archer's great idea. Good going Gary! Thanks!

The restaurant is basically on the approach end of the runway we can take a shuttle or we could walk. (half the distance that BID and town walk is; one mile??)

No one should be left behind on these trips. We usually have more planes/pilots than passengers. But, please RSVP for planning.

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: Marshfield, MA (KGHG). Oceanfront dining
